Capabilities
Everything between upload and LOI
‚ö°
Instant Data Extraction
Upload rent rolls, T-12s, or OMs. AI extracts units, rents, expenses, P&L, and occupancy in seconds ‚Äî with 100+ audit cross-checks.
üìä
DCF & Pro Forma Engine
5-year cash flow projections, IRR, cash-on-cash, equity multiples. Sensitivity sliders for vacancy, rent growth, and expenses ‚Äî updated in real time.
üéØ
Risk Scoring
AI-generated risk scores based on DSCR, LTV, and debt yield. Anomaly detection flags missing data and inconsistent expenses before they cost you.
üèòÔ∏è
Market Comps & Cap Rates
Real-time rent and sale comparables from national databases. Auto-fetch by location, unit mix, and property type. Exit cap prediction built in.
üí¨
Ask Anything
"What if occupancy drops to 90%?" ‚Äî conversational Q&A with your deal data. Adjust assumptions and see returns update instantly.
üìë
One-Click Outputs
